description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，回族，原副国级党和国家领导人。曾任两届国务院副总理，长期在农业领域工作。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, of Hui ethnicity, and a former national leader. He served two terms as Vice Premier of the State Council and has long worked in the agricultural sector.

description.zh-cn: 中国吉林省下辖的县级市，是回良玉的出生地。
description.en: A county-level city under the administration of Jilin Province, China, and the birthplace of Hui Liangyu.

description.zh-cn: 1932年至1945年间由大日本帝国在中国东北地区扶植的傀儡政权。回良玉于1944年出生于此。
description.en: A puppet state of the Empire of Japan in Northeast China from 1932 to 1945. Hui Liangyu was born here in 1944.

description.zh-cn: 位于吉林省的一所农业学校，回良玉早年毕业于此。
description.en: An agricultural school in Jilin Province from which Hui Liangyu graduated in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党吉林省委员会的党校，回良玉于1984年至1987年在此进修并获得大专文凭。
description.en: The party school of the CPC Jilin Provincial Committee, where Hui Liangyu studied from 1984 to 1987 and obtained a junior college diploma.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一场政治运动，期间回良玉曾被下放到五七干校劳动。
description.en: A political movement in China, during which Hui Liangyu was sent to a May Seventh Cadre School for labor.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理
en: Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的副总理职位。
description.en: The position of Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国务院总理。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央总书记、国家主席。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and President of the PRC.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构之一。
description.en: One of the central leading bodies of the Chinese Communist Party.

nodes.id: 中国共产党江苏省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党江苏省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在江苏省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，回良玉的前任江苏省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Hui Liangyu's predecessor as Jiangsu Provincial Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，回良玉的继任江苏省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Hui Liangyu's successor as Jiangsu Provincial Party Secretary.

nodes.id: 中国共产党安徽省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党安徽省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在安徽省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，回良玉的前任安徽省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Hui Liangyu's predecessor as Anhui Provincial Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，回良玉的继任安徽省委书记和安徽省省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Hui Liangyu's successor as Anhui Provincial Party Secretary and Governor of Anhui.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国高级领导人的一个政治级别。
description.en: A political rank for high-ranking leaders in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 第十届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

zh-cn: 第十届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

description.zh-cn: 2003年3月举行的会议，会上决定任命回良玉为国务院副总理。
description.en: A meeting held in March 2003, during which the decision was made to appoint Hui Liangyu as Vice Premier of the State Council.

nodes.id: 国家防汛抗旱总指挥部

zh-cn: 国家防汛抗旱总指挥部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院议事协调机构，负责全国的防汛抗旱工作。
description.en: A coordinating agency of the State Council of the PRC, responsible for national flood control and drought relief.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，回良玉的国务院副总理继任者。
description.en: Chinese politician, Hui Liangyu's successor as Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Anhui Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，回良玉的前任安徽省省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Hui Liangyu's predecessor as Governor of Anhui.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议湖北省委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议湖北省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在湖北省的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Hubei Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，回良玉的前任湖北省政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, Hui Liangyu's predecessor as Chairman of the Hubei Provincial CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，回良玉的继任湖北省政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, Hui Liangyu's successor as Chairman of the Hubei Provincial CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，与回良玉同为第十届国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as Vice Premier of the 10th State Council alongside Hui Liangyu.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，与回良玉同为第十届国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as Vice Premier of the 10th State Council alongside Hui Liangyu.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，与回良玉同为第十届国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as Vice Premier of the 10th State Council alongside Hui Liangyu.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，与回良玉同为第十一届国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as Vice Premier of the 11th State Council alongside Hui Liangyu.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，与回良玉同为第十一届国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as Vice Premier of the 11th State Council alongside Hui Liangyu.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，与回良玉同为第十一届国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as Vice Premier of the 11th State Council alongside Hui Liangyu.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在回良玉担任江苏省委书记期间任副书记兼省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as deputy secretary and governor while Hui Liangyu was Jiangsu Provincial Party Secretary.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在2002年至2007年间的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body of the Chinese Communist Party from 2002 to 2007.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十七届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十七届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在2007年至2012年间的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body of the Chinese Communist Party from 2007 to 2012.

description.zh-cn: 回良玉1944年10月出生在吉林省榆树县（今榆树市）。
description.en: Hui Liangyu was born in Yushu County (present-day Yushu City), Jilin Province in October 1944.

description.zh-cn: 回良玉于1944年10月出生于满洲国时期的吉林省榆树县。
description.en: Hui Liangyu was born in Yushu County, Jilin Province, during the Manchukuo period in October 1944.

description.zh-cn: 回良玉早年毕业于吉林省农业学校会统专业。
description.en: Hui Liangyu graduated from the accounting and statistics major at Jilin Provincial Agricultural School in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 1984年至1987年间，回良玉在中共吉林省委党校函授班进修，并获得大专文凭。
description.en: From 1984 to 1987, Hui Liangyu studied in the correspondence course of the Party School of the CPC Jilin Provincial Committee and obtained a junior college diploma.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命开始后，回良玉曾被下放到五七干校劳动。
description.en: After the start of the Cultural Revolution, Hui Liangyu was sent to a May Seventh Cadre School for labor.

description.zh-cn: 回良玉于1966年4月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Hui Liangyu joined the Chinese Communist Party in April 1966.

description.zh-cn: 回良玉接替傅锡寿担任安徽省人民政府省长。
description.en: Hui Liangyu succeeded Fu Xishou as Governor of the Anhui Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 回良玉卸任安徽省省长后，由王太华接任。
description.en: After Hui Liangyu stepped down as Governor of Anhui, Wang Taihua succeeded him.

relationships.target: 中国共产党安徽省委员会

description.zh-cn: 在回良玉担任中共安徽省委书记期间，王太华为副书记兼省长。
description.en: While Hui Liangyu served as Secretary of the CPC Anhui Provincial Committee, Wang Taihua was the Deputy Secretary and Governor.

description.zh-cn: 回良玉接替卢荣景担任中共安徽省委书记。
description.en: Hui Liangyu succeeded Lu Rongjing as Secretary of the CPC Anhui Provincial Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党江苏省委员会

description.zh-cn: 在回良玉担任中共江苏省委书记期间，季允石为副书记兼省长。
description.en: While Hui Liangyu served as Secretary of the CPC Jiangsu Provincial Committee, Ji Yunshi was the Deputy Secretary and Governor.

description.zh-cn: 回良玉接替陈焕友担任中共江苏省委书记。
description.en: Hui Liangyu succeeded Chen Huanyou as Secretary of the CPC Jiangsu Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 回良玉卸任中共江苏省委书记后，由李源潮接任。
description.en: After Hui Liangyu stepped down as Secretary of the CPC Jiangsu Provincial Committee, Li Yuanchao succeeded him.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 回良玉是中共第十六届、十七届中央政治局委员。
description.en: Hui Liangyu was a member of the Politburo of the 16th and 17th CPC Central Committees.

position.en: Member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 在胡锦涛担任中共中央总书记期间，回良玉是两届中央政治局委员。
description.en: During Hu Jintao's tenure as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, Hui Liangyu was a member of the Politburo for two terms.

description.zh-cn: 根据国务院总理温家宝的提名，回良玉出任国务院副总理。
description.en: Based on the nomination of Premier Wen Jiabao, Hui Liangyu was appointed Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主席胡锦涛发布主席令，任命回良玉为国务院副总理。
description.en: President of the People's Republic of China Hu Jintao issued a presidential decree appointing Hui Liangyu as Vice Premier of the State Council.

relationships.source: 第十届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

description.zh-cn: 根据第十届全国人民代表大会第一次会议的决定，回良玉被任命为国务院副总理。
description.en: According to the decision of the first session of the 10th National People's Congress, Hui Liangyu was appointed Vice Premier of the State Council.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

position.en: Vice Premier of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 在温家宝担任国务院总理期间，回良玉是两届国务院副总理。
description.en: During Wen Jiabao's tenure as Premier of the State Council, Hui Liangyu served as Vice Premier for two terms.

description.zh-cn: 回良玉卸任国务院副总理后，由汪洋等人接任。
description.en: After Hui Liangyu stepped down as Vice Premier of the State Council, Wang Yang and others succeeded him.

relationships.target: 国家防汛抗旱总指挥部

description.zh-cn: 回良玉接替温家宝担任国家防汛抗旱总指挥部总指挥。
description.en: Hui Liangyu succeeded Wen Jiabao as Commander-in-chief of the State Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议湖北省委员会

description.zh-cn: 回良玉接替沈因洛担任湖北省政协主席。
description.en: Hui Liangyu succeeded Shen Yinluo as Chairman of the Hubei Provincial CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 回良玉卸任湖北省政协主席后，由钱运录接任。
description.en: After Hui Liangyu stepped down as Chairman of the Hubei Provincial CPPCC, Qian Yunlu succeeded him.

description.zh-cn: 在第十届国务院中与黄菊同为副总理。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier alongside Huang Ju in the 10th State Council.

description.zh-cn: 在第十届国务院中与吴仪同为副总理。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier alongside Wu Yi in the 10th State Council.

description.zh-cn: 在第十届国务院中与曾培炎同为副总理。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier alongside Zeng Peiyan in the 10th State Council.

description.zh-cn: 在第十一届国务院中与李克强同为副总理。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier alongside Li Keqiang in the 11th State Council.

description.zh-cn: 在第十一届国务院中与张德江同为副总理。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier alongside Zhang Dejiang in the 11th State Council.

description.zh-cn: 在第十一届国务院中与王岐山同为副总理。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier alongside Wang Qishan in the 11th State Council.
